channel.title: Need Client Complier Help Please!
channel.description:
Hey guys im using rune world client but i cant get the complier to run i keep on getting "Javac: file not found: *java Usage: javac <options> <source Files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
my code is @echo off COLOR 09 title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
i have jdk 7 and my Varaibles set but i have no idea how to fix this any help would be greatly appreciated!!! Please dont get on here and troll and say i am a F'ing retard or something like that i understand this is a noobish question but i know that already no need to point it out again :D

item.title: Need Client Complier Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @fish_iz_ill fish iz ill
item.description:
@fish_iz_ill wrote:

Hey guys im using rune world client but i cant get the complier to run i keep on getting
"Javac: file not found: *java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

my code is
@echo off
COLOR 09
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

i have jdk 7 and my Varaibles set but i have no idea how to fix this
any help would be greatly appreciated!!!
Please dont get on here and troll and say i am a F’ing retard or something like that i understand this is a noobish question but i know that already no need to point it out again
